text: Toghrol Tower (also Tughril, Toghrul, TuÄŸrul, or Tughrul Tower) is a 12th- century tower in the city of Rey, Iran. The 20 meters tall brick tower is the tomb of the first Seljuk ruler Tughril, who died in Rey in 1063. The tower is kept by Iran's Cultural Heritage Organization. == Resources == * Toqrol Tower, Ray irantouronline.com Category:Towers in Asia Category:12th-century buildings and structures Category:Tehran Province Category:Buildings and structures in Iran
title: Toghrol Tower
